comment: With this app you can edit OSM right in the field!! UPD: where is menu with classes of tags ('abc' button)?
Wouldn't work.

title: Bester OSM-Editor für Android
comment: Bester OSM-Editor für Android. Seit den ersten Versionen hat er sich großartig entwickelt.

title: Love it
comment: Great work Marcus!!! I love this tool. Its really user friendly and reliable. I often use this tool to add new streets and locations to OSM. Thanks buddy for this great app.

title: Very good!
comment: As for the limitations of mobile devices, it is well designed and convenient in use.

title: Best but still
comment: Needs plenty of enhancements to make it easier to use

title: The only one is the best
comment: Likes to lose data I've entered when it crashes, which is often. But it's the only complete OSM editor for android. Not a bad app, but could be so much better.

title: Awesome
comment: Love this app! So useful!

title: Handsome when travelling
comment: Allows to edit OSM quickly after you've noted that it needs improvement

title: Good mapping solution
comment: While it is not easy to add POIs and lines on a smartphone, this is a good app to map things slightly larger than a single POI, or to map changes on buildings, streets and the like.

title: Extremely useful for small changes
comment: Extremely useful if you need to perform some small edits when you outside

title: I love it
comment: Finally, I find editing OSM accessible to me, easy and somewhat intuitive. I love this app, and can't seem to stop mentioning it to friends
Pretty cool app!
Best OSM editor for  Android!
nice OSM editor for Android

title: Cool
comment: Almost like JOSM and usable from phone! Fantastic! Also can be used just for submitting 'bugs' while in field.

title: Редактор для уточнения замапленных мест.
comment: Редактор с большими возможностями. Можно править не только теги, но и рисовать и редактировать геометрии. Пробовал для маппинга дворов многоэтажек.  Топосъёмку с нуля в нём делать сложно - редактор лучше подходит для мест которые уже хорошо замаплены. Удобно ставить новые магазины, или этажность домов.

title: Needs work
comment: Not yet intuitive. support docs thoroughly lacking detail. can't see instructions on how to add turn restrictions for example. Still loses all unuploadedd points notes and even local gps traces (08/14). Also, map still doesn't auto centre on GPS location and zoom to that point even with Follow GPS enabled, nor can it get your location from network or WiFi, only GPS.

Turn restrictions have just been added very, very recently.
Please report any crash to https://code.google.com/p/osmeditor4android/issues/list .
You have to check "follow GPS" to auto-center.
OSM is simply not allowed to use Google's GPS maps. Sorry.
Great app. I could do the edits I wanted. Keep up the good work.
It's improved a lot

title: Great app!
comment: I started using iD  on the browser.  But after a while my finger started hurting from all that clicking.  I have been using this app for a while now, and with my tablet and stylus, it feels so much more easy and natural.
@look4book what if you clic menu>more>transfer>download or download other location?

title: relations are supported
comment: new relations editor makes this the best mobile osm editor.

title: Can't log in
comment: When I try to submit an edit, it gives me a login screen.  Unfortunately when I go to input my username or password, it doesn't bring up my keyboard and I can't input anything, leaving me dead in the water.
Decent

title: A good start
comment: Many reviews are saying that it destroys relations. Its true, it's easy to screw things up. But the important use of the app is its usability in real situation. You don't have to take notes and photos. Its easy to add a point, needs some experience for lines and I haven't tried relations yet( and not broke any existing ones).   I think it's a great app that has a long path to travel.

title: Nice
comment: Some datas are not able to upload because of relations issue .. plz fix it .. other things are good ...
Crash after crash

Please update to 0.9.x .
We have fixed lots of issues since 0.8 .
Google shows not a single crash for any of the 0.9.x versions ever.

title: Breaks data
comment: Vespucci currently breaks relations (2013-01-11).

title: Amazing update
comment: I've been really enjoying the update and have found the usability has improved incredibly. I get a lot more mapping done and always trust the the days is safe between uploads. On-the-go mapping is very useful for me where GPS strength can be nonexistent on small alleys.

title: Great for offline editing
comment: Thanks to download/upload function there is also possible to edit maps without online connection. You can edit the map even when you are in the middle of nowhere.

title: Great OSM tool
comment: I use this all the time for quick and easy on-the-road editing. It's light and well-designed. Now it has undo/redo, I want to give it 6 stars!

title: Buggy
comment: New version is quite unusable on Lg p500

title: Massive improvement in last update
comment: Added undo, UI now more user friendly, all in all this is 95% of the way to where it needs to be. It is the most useful around for street level mapping and I'm looking forward to seeing future updates

title: Ok
comment: Good application.

title: Excellent tool!
comment: This is great for the open street project.  Can make small edits quickly from phone or tablets.  Great start.  Definitely needs an undo button.

title: Promising start
comment: Good idea for an app but the implementation could use a little bit more work. Tag presets and then undo feature would be the most useful.

title: Not usable yet
comment: 4 stars are for motivation. Please add undo function and key/value selection lists for node edit. Even better would be open source code.

title: Best OSM editor but...
comment: This is really the only android osm editor I know of.looks promising and I'd like to rate out higher but it REALLY needs an undo option.

title: Great on-site editing map
comment: A bit complicated to learn, but when you learn, it flies. I do most of my mapping with it now.
Great for quick in the field edits. Hard to do anything significant though.
Basic but does the job right there on the ground. Tag editor cluttered on small screens. No relation support yet. Re-entering the app can be crashy.
Excellent app, i love it
Much improved
V.0.6.3 needs colors in maps, errors after downloads.
Love the OSM
I can see myself using this a lot. This will get me back into mapping
Looks promising, but a lot of work needs to be done.
Excellent to have this available !
A good start, the UI is a little confusing at first and it'd be nice if unnamed highways would show up as a diff colour or something
